javavis.jip2d.util
Class Circumference

java.lang.Object
  javavis.jip2d.util.Circumference

public class Circumference
extends java.lang.Object

It implements a class with auxiliar methods to work with circumferences in the FHoughCirc function and in the cuentaMonedas application.

Field Summary
 int centroX
          X coordinate of the center of circumference
 int centroY
          Y coordinate of the center of circumference
 int radio
          Radius of the circumference (The value has to be integer type because we are worked with pixels)
 
Constructor Summary
Circumference()
          It constructs a circumference without its values are started.
Circumference(int cx, int cy, int r)
          It constructs a circumference with its member variables start with the received values as parameters.
 
Method Summary
static int calculatesRadius(int cent_X, int cent_Y, int coord_x, int coord_y)
          It returns the radius of circumference, it is calculated from its center and a point which belong to the circumference.
static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getPoints(Circumference circ)
          It returns all points that form the perimeter of circumference, from the centre and the radius of the circumference.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
